modName: Hello Darkness My Old Friend (Sound of Silence) -- Death Music Replacer
summary: Replaces player death music/sound with the "Hello Darkness My Old Friend" meme
descriptionHtml:
Replaces player death music/sound with the "Hello Darkness My Old Friend" meme
Its also cuts out early because the death "cutscene" is like 5-6 seconds and the audio clip is 9 secs and i couldn't get the shortened version to work for some reason, but oh well, fine
[size=1](fps counter is not included)[/size]
[youtube]-hUnlvWPrhQ[/youtube]
author: FerretKr
